name: Hold Brawl
description:
Hold the pad and drag it to collect points. Use the shield to bounce back the obstacles! Make you own record and personalize the environment, complete all the goals and have fun.

Be careful to not get hit and hit back to earn coins. Time your actions, target carefully and become the swipe master!

Haven't you got enough time? Try the "One Min" Mode it can be even more challenging, you have one minute to make your record. Be prepared you are going to see bigger obstacles in the end.

Pro tip : don't play with your thumb!
